objects.text: • Unbreakable & Lightweight • Quick Access Compartment • Silent Wheels

product_details.description:
Unbreakable & lightweight
Made of polycarbonate hard shell that is flexible & strong. 

Quick access front compartment
A hard shell front pocket that can store up to 15.6” laptop, a slim power bank, passports, boarding passes and an iPad or a magazine.  

Super silent ninja wheels
8 smooth Japanese Hinomoto wheels that glide across carpets and squeaky floors. 

TSA approved lock
Comes with a keyless TSA lock which secures both your front and main compartments. Simply push the latch towards the numbers to unlock. Instructions to set your lock code will be inside the luggage.

Dimensions, weight and capacity
Dimension: 56 x 34.5 x 24 cm; Weight: 3.4 Kg; Capacity: 40 litres

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a premium travel suitcase in the center, accentuated by circular dashed white outlines that give it a spotlight effect. The top of the banner features a bold and modern headline text layer (`heading`) in white, complemented by a futuristic subheading (`subheading`) in a striking yellow, separated by an angled white line. A vibrant orange-yellow radial badge on the right prominently contains the price (`price`). At the bottom, a short bullet point description (`description`) highlights the product features. A bright yellow call-to-action button (`cta_button_background` with `cta` text) invites user engagement. Decorative geometric shapes and lines frame the composition artfully.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue (#0F1A38)
- Gradient Blue (#2E4482 to #1A2A59)
- Golden Yellow (#FFCC33)
- Vivid Orange (#FFA500)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The suitcase features a sleek and modern color palette dominated by a deep navy blue (#1A2A45), which envelops the exterior shell, creating a sense of sophistication and durability. This is contrasted by vibrant mustard yellow (#F7B500) used in the interior lining and accent trims, creating a bold and energetic look that naturally draws the eye. The wheels cleverly incorporate both colors — yellow centers against black (#000000) rims — blending practicality with style. The harmonious contrast between the dark blue and bright yellow ensures both stand out individually while complementing each other, making them ideal for use in an attention-grabbing advertisement banner.
